rooms.description: Entrance area that adheres to Vastu principles with auspicious directions and ample natural light.

Open-plan living area combined with the kitchen. Features energy-efficient appliances, eco-friendly materials, and a layout that encourages communal space as per Vastu guidelines for harmony and flow.
Studio bedroom combining relaxation and private living spaces. Designed with ample natural ventilation and light to promote well-being, following eco-friendly practices and local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing the east for auspicious energy according to Vastu principles.
Large windows installed on north and south walls to maximize daylight and natural ventilation, supporting eco-friendly design.

external_spaces.description: Eco-friendly swimming pool with water recycling system and integrated green landscaping in compliance with local building norms.
